Uses of Interface
controllers.Controller

  • Packages that use Controller 
    Package Description
    controllers  

    • Uses of Controller in controllers

      Classes in controllers that implement Controller 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AllMusicsController
      Central view show up all music in the network.
      class  CentralFrameController
      the central view who will change often with each subView and their Controllers.
      class  CommentsController
      Handle display of selected musics' comments and pop up of comment form for selected music.
      class  ContactListController 
      class  CurrentMusicInfoController 
      class  DetailsMusicController
      Central view to show all information about a music.
      class  DistantUserController 
      class  DownloadController
      Controller for right down view with progress bar about current music download.
      class  ExportProfileController 
      class  ForgottenPasswordController
      Controller used for the forgotten password form.
      class  ImportController 
      class  LoginController
      Controller used for the login view.
      class  MainController
      Controller in charge of managing the other (central, left and right).
      class  MyMusicsController
      Central view show up my musics.
      class  MyPlaylistsController
      Side view of my playlists.
      class  NewCommentController 
      class  NewMusicController
      Pop-up a view when the user want to add a music from a local file.
      class  OnlineUsersListController
      The left middle view containing all connected users.
      class  PasswordEditController 
      class  PlayerController
      PlayerMusic Controller.
      class  ProfileDeletionController 
      class  ProfileEditController
      Central view that permit the user to edit his profile.
      class  SearchMusicController 
      class  ShareController
      Controller of the sharing/unsharing popup window.
      class  SignUpController
      Controller used for the sign up form.
      class  UserInfoController
      Controller used for managing the top left view with the nickname and the buttons to modify profile and disconnect.
